mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_dd(user_id, extra_time_stamp, extra_has_loot_time, extra_type, extra_last_time_stamp, dd_daily, dd_weekly, dd_monthly, dd_total, dd_extra_item_id) VALUES(#{userId}, #{extraTimeStamp}, #{extraHasLootTime}, #{extraType}, #{extraLastTimeStamp}, #{ddDaily}, #{ddWeekly}, #{ddMonthly}, #{ddTotal}, #{ddExtraItemId}) ON duplicate key update extra_time_stamp=#{extraTimeStamp}, extra_has_loot_time=#{extraHasLootTime}, extra_type=#{extraType}, extra_last_time_stamp=#{extraLastTimeStamp}, dd_daily=#{ddDaily}, dd_weekly=#{ddWeekly}, dd_monthly=#{ddMonthly}, dd_total=#{ddTotal}, dd_extra_item_id=#{ddExtraItemId}
